title: HUD THOUGHTS:
body:
Hello, just wanted to see wat u thought about it :P
I like it in some ways, but i still miss the old one

replies.body:
New HUD is the most stupid thing I have ever seen in a game's design. Firstly the new HUD makes you have to press 'C' to see your stats - the most stupid part of the HUD, secondly your consumables are now nearly pitch black when you are dead making it difficult to buy items because you can't see your consumables in your inventory, lastly when you are out of mana the ability is no longer light blue; it is darkened. This is why I find new HUD shit idc if u disagree. 

P.S. Riot give us the option of HUD..
you can press the little helmet to keep stats up constant

> secondly your consumables are now nearly pitch black when you are dead making it difficult to buy items because you can't >see your consumables in your inventory, lastly when you are out of mana the ability is no longer light blue; it is darkened.

This is mainly why I dislike the new HUD also. Also the spell buttons are just too large and having a large clump of information in the centre of the bottom of the screen is just taking up space.
This new hud is so fking sht.
can deal with the HUD itself but gangplank as narrator is frikking annoying, at the very least offer a voice over pack to silence the scurvy pirate for once and all.

U can just mute him u know :P
Steps:

1) Open in-game menu (not store ffs)
2) Click 'Sound'
3) There should be a option on muting the Annoncer, mute it
I'd prefer to have the option to turn it back to the old HUD. The new one has the feeling of being a  bit "kiddy", like I am playing a Sponge Bob Square Pants game.

Well it's pretty obvious no one likes the new HUD, even after riot says: "After months of polishing"
Some people are calling it a last minute job.
change it back, this new hud reduced my fps from 125 to 25 fps screw it its ugly, and lag inducing get rid of it
